You're just waiting for an opportunity to invade the continent.\""},{"lineNumber":130746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、いえ、そんなことは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, that's not true!?\""},{"lineNumber":130747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより今、話すべきはリーザス以外の各国がどう動くべきか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, what we should discuss now is how the other countries besides Leesas should act,"},{"lineNumber":130748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ということじゃないかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"isn't that right?\""},{"lineNumber":130749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今更なにを……各国が協力しあう為の首脳会談の筈でしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's the point now... This is supposed to be a summit for countries to cooperate.\""},{"lineNumber":130750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、違うわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh no, it's different.\""},{"lineNumber":130751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、世界で最も強い国はリアのリーザス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, the strongest country in the world is Ria's Leesas."},{"lineNumber":130752,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方達はリアにお願いして傘下に入れて下さいと懇願する場よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are here to beg Ria to let you come under her umbrella.\""},{"lineNumber":130753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふ、っざけたことを！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Y-you've got to be kidding!\""},{"lineNumber":130754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック・ザ・ガンジー副王、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Magic the Gandhi, Vice King,"},{"lineNumber":130755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方は今この場に立場ある身で来ている筈」","translatedEnglishLine":"you are supposed to be someone of standing at this meeting."},{"lineNumber":130756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ディベートごっこがしたいのなら、学園でおやりなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to play debate games, do it at school.\""},{"lineNumber":130757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha!\""},{"lineNumber":130758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア女王、いい加減にされよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Queen Ria, enough is enough!"},{"lineNumber":130759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　場をかき乱すことが目的なら退室して頂きたい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If your intention is to disturb the meeting, please leave!\""},{"lineNumber":130760,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりに横暴極まりないリアの態度に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Ria's excessively domineering attitude,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女達だろうに」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aren't they my women?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、今回は自由都市地帯の王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this time the kings of the Free City Zone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の貴族の方々など大勢の要人の方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and many important people such as nobles from various countries

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらっしゃっています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に皆さん集まって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone has already gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首脳会談を始めているそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and apparently the summit talks have begun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様のお仕事は適切なタイミングで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance's job is to propose cooperation at the appropriate timing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で協力することを提案して頂くことだそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: asking everyone to work together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなんで大丈夫なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that really okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後はクルックーさんが上手くフォローして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, Mr. Kurukku will skilfully follow up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場をまとめて下さるそうですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and apparently bring the situation under control."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……」
「面倒だなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、皆に仲良くしろって言うだけだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, all I have to do is tell everyone to get along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが終わったら部屋に戻るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and after that, I'll go back to my room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （場合によっては、ばっくれるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Depending on the situation, I might just sneak away.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はふ、なんだかドキドキしてきました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hafu, somehow I'm getting nervous..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、お前が緊張してどうすんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot, why are you nervous?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、ついたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, we've arrived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは普段通りの何気なさで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance casually,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首脳会談の行われている部屋の扉を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened the door to the room where the summit talks were taking place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたねーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわっ！？　な、なんだぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa!? W-what's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしなさいよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough already!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、苦しんでいるのはリーザスだけじゃないのよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not just Leesas suffering now!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの知らなーい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアとリーザスは生き残れるもーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ria and Leesas will survive!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大声は、世界一裕福な国家リーザスの女王リアと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The loud voices belonged to Ria, queen of Leesas, the world's wealthiest nation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法大国ゼスの王女マジックの口喧嘩だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic, princess of Zeth, the magical superpower, who were arguing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広い会議室の中、大国のトップ達は中央の円卓を囲み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the large conference room, the leaders of the great nations sat around the central round table,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁際にはズラリと各国の政治家、貴族、王が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while politicians, nobles, and kings from various countries lined the walls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内には息の詰まるような緊張感が漂っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room was filled with a suffocating tension.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしなさい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stop this at once!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き勝手なことばかり言って！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always saying whatever you please!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、リアはリーザス女王として国の意向を伝えているだけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ria is just conveying the wishes of the country as the queen of Leesas."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「協力しあうなんてナンセンス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cooperating is nonsense.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれがそれぞれの動きたいように動けばいいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone should just act as they please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、くぅ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, ku..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ大統領！　貴方も同じ考えなの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "President Sheela! Do you think the same way!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひえっ！？　い、いえ、私はその……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!? N-no, I... um..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと……」
「ふんっ、お飾りの大統領に言えることなんて何もないでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you have nothing to say as a figurehead president, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……JAPANは現在ほぼ無傷を保っています……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... JAPAN has so far remained mostly unscathed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは我が国から支援をしたいと思っているのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We would like to offer assistance from our country here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、冗談言わないで、これを機と見て大陸に攻め込むつもりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, don't be ridiculous. You're just waiting for an opportunity to invade the continent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、いえ、そんなことは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, that's not true!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより今、話すべきはリーザス以外の各国がどう動くべきか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, what we should discuss now is how the other countries besides Leesas should act,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ということじゃないかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't that right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今更なにを……各国が協力しあう為の首脳会談の筈でしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the point now... This is supposed to be a summit for countries to cooperate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、違うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh no, it's different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、世界で最も強い国はリアのリーザス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the strongest country in the world is Ria's Leesas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方達はリアにお願いして傘下に入れて下さいと懇願する場よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are here to beg Ria to let you come under her umbrella."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふ、っざけたことを！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Y-you've got to be kidding!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック・ザ・ガンジー副王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Magic the Gandhi, Vice King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方は今この場に立場ある身で来ている筈」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are supposed to be someone of standing at this meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ディベートごっこがしたいのなら、学園でおやりなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to play debate games, do it at school."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア女王、いい加減にされよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Queen Ria, enough is enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場をかき乱すことが目的なら退室して頂きたい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If your intention is to disturb the meeting, please leave!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに横暴極まりないリアの態度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Ria's excessively domineering attitude,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

You're just waiting for an opportunity to invade the continent.\""},{"lineNumber":130746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、いえ、そんなことは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, that's not true!?\""},{"lineNumber":130747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより今、話すべきはリーザス以外の各国がどう動くべきか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, what we should discuss now is how the other countries besides Leesas should act,"},{"lineNumber":130748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ということじゃないかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"isn't that right?\""},{"lineNumber":130749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今更なにを……各国が協力しあう為の首脳会談の筈でしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's the point now... This is supposed to be a summit for countries to cooperate.\""},{"lineNumber":130750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、違うわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh no, it's different.\""},{"lineNumber":130751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、世界で最も強い国はリアのリーザス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, the strongest country in the world is Ria's Leesas."},{"lineNumber":130752,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方達はリアにお願いして傘下に入れて下さいと懇願する場よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are here to beg Ria to let you come under her umbrella.\""},{"lineNumber":130753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふ、っざけたことを！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Y-you've got to be kidding!\""},{"lineNumber":130754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック・ザ・ガンジー副王、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Magic the Gandhi, Vice King,"},{"lineNumber":130755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方は今この場に立場ある身で来ている筈」","translatedEnglishLine":"you are supposed to be someone of standing at this meeting."},{"lineNumber":130756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ディベートごっこがしたいのなら、学園でおやりなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to play debate games, do it at school.\""},{"lineNumber":130757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha!\""},{"lineNumber":130758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア女王、いい加減にされよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Queen Ria, enough is enough!"},{"lineNumber":130759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　場をかき乱すことが目的なら退室して頂きたい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If your intention is to disturb the meeting, please leave!\""},{"lineNumber":130760,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりに横暴極まりないリアの態度に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Ria's excessively domineering attitude,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女達だろうに」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aren't they my women?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、今回は自由都市地帯の王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this time the kings of the Free City Zone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の貴族の方々など大勢の要人の方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and many important people such as nobles from various countries

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらっしゃっています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に皆さん集まって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone has already gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首脳会談を始めているそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and apparently the summit talks have begun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様のお仕事は適切なタイミングで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance's job is to propose cooperation at the appropriate timing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で協力することを提案して頂くことだそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: asking everyone to work together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなんで大丈夫なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that really okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後はクルックーさんが上手くフォローして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, Mr. Kurukku will skilfully follow up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場をまとめて下さるそうですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and apparently bring the situation under control."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……」
「面倒だなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a pain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、皆に仲良くしろって言うだけだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, all I have to do is tell everyone to get along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが終わったら部屋に戻るか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and after that, I'll go back to my room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （場合によっては、ばっくれるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Depending on the situation, I might just sneak away.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はふ、なんだかドキドキしてきました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hafu, somehow I'm getting nervous..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、お前が緊張してどうすんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Idiot, why are you nervous?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、ついたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, we've arrived."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは普段通りの何気なさで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance casually,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首脳会談の行われている部屋の扉を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened the door to the room where the summit talks were taking place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたねーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわっ！？　な、なんだぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa!? W-what's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしなさいよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough already!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、苦しんでいるのはリーザスだけじゃないのよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not just Leesas suffering now!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの知らなーい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアとリーザスは生き残れるもーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ria and Leesas will survive!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大声は、世界一裕福な国家リーザスの女王リアと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The loud voices belonged to Ria, queen of Leesas, the world's wealthiest nation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法大国ゼスの王女マジックの口喧嘩だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic, princess of Zeth, the magical superpower, who were arguing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広い会議室の中、大国のトップ達は中央の円卓を囲み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the large conference room, the leaders of the great nations sat around the central round table,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁際にはズラリと各国の政治家、貴族、王が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while politicians, nobles, and kings from various countries lined the walls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内には息の詰まるような緊張感が漂っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room was filled with a suffocating tension.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい加減にしなさい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stop this at once!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き勝手なことばかり言って！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always saying whatever you please!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、リアはリーザス女王として国の意向を伝えているだけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Ria is just conveying the wishes of the country as the queen of Leesas."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「協力しあうなんてナンセンス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cooperating is nonsense.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれがそれぞれの動きたいように動けばいいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone should just act as they please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、くぅ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, ku..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ大統領！　貴方も同じ考えなの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "President Sheela! Do you think the same way!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひえっ！？　い、いえ、私はその……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!? N-no, I... um..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと……」
「ふんっ、お飾りの大統領に言えることなんて何もないでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you have nothing to say as a figurehead president, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……JAPANは現在ほぼ無傷を保っています……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... JAPAN has so far remained mostly unscathed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは我が国から支援をしたいと思っているのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We would like to offer assistance from our country here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、冗談言わないで、これを機と見て大陸に攻め込むつもりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, don't be ridiculous. You're just waiting for an opportunity to invade the continent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、いえ、そんなことは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, that's not true!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより今、話すべきはリーザス以外の各国がどう動くべきか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, what we should discuss now is how the other countries besides Leesas should act,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ということじゃないかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't that right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今更なにを……各国が協力しあう為の首脳会談の筈でしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's the point now... This is supposed to be a summit for countries to cooperate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、違うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh no, it's different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、世界で最も強い国はリアのリーザス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the strongest country in the world is Ria's Leesas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方達はリアにお願いして傘下に入れて下さいと懇願する場よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are here to beg Ria to let you come under her umbrella."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふ、っざけたことを！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Y-you've got to be kidding!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック・ザ・ガンジー副王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Magic the Gandhi, Vice King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方は今この場に立場ある身で来ている筈」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are supposed to be someone of standing at this meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ディベートごっこがしたいのなら、学園でおやりなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to play debate games, do it at school."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア女王、いい加減にされよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Queen Ria, enough is enough!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場をかき乱すことが目的なら退室して頂きたい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If your intention is to disturb the meeting, please leave!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに横暴極まりないリアの態度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Ria's excessively domineering attitude,
